item.title: How to make a time-lapse video with free tools and a DSLR camera
item.description:
Introduction

Time-lapse photographyÂ is a wonderful effect to make your images alive instead of static because you can make a plain (or almost boring) event and make it so much more dramatic. However, it is something that usually needs a lot of time investment to get something acceptable.

Considering my family was planning to decorate the Christmas tree during the weekend, I decided to take my camera and capture the whole event in a time-lapse video.
